医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Hackensack Meridian 的 Mary Sedarous 博士荣获 ALS United Mid-Atlantic 的希望之火奖泽西海岸大学医学中心哈肯萨克子午线神经科学研究所的 ALS 中心医学主任 Mary Sedarous 医学博士在 ALS United Mid-Atlantic 的 2023 年度庆典上荣获该组织的希望之火奖，以表彰其研究和创新。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Hackensack-Meridians-Dr-Mary-Sedarous-wins-ALS-United-Mid-Atlantics-Flame-of-Hope-Award.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Hackensack-Meridians-Dr-Mary-Sedarous-wins-ALS-United-Mid-Atlantics-Flame-of-Hope-Award.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0cd286d-6d99-4965-8f7c-020c45ebb56c Tue, 26 Dec 2023 11:52:15 -0500 Hackensack Meridian's Dr. Mary Sedarous wins ALS United Mid-Atlantic's Flame of Hope Award
第 6 年，KFF 健康新闻 - NPR 的“本月法案”帮助处于不断变化的系统中的患者2023 年，我们的全国报告团队一直在努力为您准备一份节日礼物：一套关于如何应对错综复杂的美国医疗系统的建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/In-year-6-KFF-Health-News-NPRe28099s-e28098Bill-of-the-Monthe28099-helps-病人-in-a-changing-system。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/In-year-6-KFF-Health-News-NPRe28099s-e28098Bill-of-the-Monthe28099-helps-病人-in-a-changing-system。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17fec6cf-5ddd-4020-b00c-6012e39ae7f6 Tue, 26 Dec 2023 11:48:22 -0500 In year 6, KFF Health News-NPR’s ‘Bill of the Month’ helps patients in a changing system
研究人员获得两项资助用于研究结核病药物开发威尔康奈尔医学研究人员和结核病药物加速器已从比尔及梅琳达·盖茨基金会获得两笔总计 680 万美元的资助，用于研究结核病 (TB) 药物开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Researchers-receive-two-grants-to-study-tuberculosis-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Researchers-receive-two-grants-to-study-tuberculosis-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eda504c4-aa76-4c2c-91be-78737c500935 Tue, 26 Dec 2023 11:45:13 -0500 Researchers receive two grants to study tuberculosis drug development
肠道微生物组多样性可预测健康儿童的认知功能和大脑结构新的证据表明肠道微生物组与认知结果和神经发育障碍有关，但肠道微生物代谢对典型神经发育的影响尚未得到详细探讨。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Gut-microbiome-diversity-predicts-cognitive-function-and-brain-struct-in-healthy-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Gut-microbiome-diversity-predicts-cognitive-function-and-brain-struct-in-healthy-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3efb916d-198d-4560-a355-72e4a1693d74 Tue, 26 Dec 2023 11:41:42 -0500 Gut microbiome diversity predicts cognitive function and brain structure in healthy children
β-淀粉样蛋白积累增加可能与老年人患阿尔茨海默病的风险有关一项新的研究表明，大脑中淀粉样蛋白沉积的严重程度 -；不仅仅是年龄——；可能是确定谁将受益于新的抗淀粉样蛋白疗法以延缓阿尔茨海默病进展的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Increased-ceb2-amyloid-accumulation-may-be-linked-to-Alzheimere28099s-dementia-risk-in-oldest-of-the-old.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Increased-ceb2-amyloid-accumulation-may-be-linked-to-Alzheimere28099s-dementia-risk-in-oldest-of-the-old.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d73421e9-1453-4da5-b039-008a7ba79cf4 Tue, 26 Dec 2023 09:34:51 -0500 Increased β-amyloid accumulation may be linked to Alzheimer’s dementia risk in oldest of the old
为数百万高血压患者提供个性化治疗HMRI 和纽卡斯尔大学研究员 Murray Cairns 教授及其精准医学团队发现了一种方法，可以预测谁会对降低体内钠的血压治疗产生反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Unlocking-personalized-treatment-for-millions-with-high-blood-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Unlocking-personalized-treatment-for-millions-with-high-blood-pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c277254-3339-4d08-b615-409290c98c3c Tue, 26 Dec 2023 09:26:31 -0500 Unlocking personalized treatment for millions with high blood pressure
研究：睡眠时拥抱是有代价的，即使对老鼠来说也是如此密歇根大学的研究人员表示，如果你睡眠有困难，那么问题可能是与床友的接触造成的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Study-Cuddling-during-sleep-comes-at-a-cost-even-for-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Study-Cuddling-during-sleep-comes-at-a-cost-even-for-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=339bab3c-4e35-4086-8a45-26d813de0e40 Tue, 26 Dec 2023 02:32:23 -0500 Study: Cuddling during sleep comes at a cost, even for mice
有针对性的健康信息没有针对美国黑人医生用来提高患者对健康信息的参与度的策略可能对美国白人有效，但对美国黑人可能会适得其反。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Targeted-health-information-misses-the-mark-for-Black-Americans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Targeted-health-information-misses-the-mark-for-Black-Americans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8da69e7e-96c2-4eed-b913-0ffd3e8d8fce Tue, 26 Dec 2023 02:19:37 -0500 Targeted health information misses the mark for Black Americans
为结核病的演变提供新的线索最近的研究表明，人群中结核病感染的出现比以前已知的中东病例早数万年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Shedding-new-light-on-the-evolution-of-tuberculosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Shedding-new-light-on-the-evolution-of-tuberculosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65eecb7f-889d-40a1-8c9c-044481b58ebc Tue, 26 Dec 2023 02:01:35 -0500 Shedding new light on the evolution of tuberculosis
常见的胃细菌可能与阿尔茨海默病的较高风险有关新的研究表明，世界三分之二的人口中发现的一种常见胃细菌可能与阿尔茨海默病的较高风险有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Common-stomach-bacteria-may-be-linked-to-higher-risk-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Common-stomach-bacteria-may-be-linked-to-higher-risk-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27399f42-3825-41f5-9241-51df91b50fbd Tue, 26 Dec 2023 00:51:30 -0500 Common stomach bacteria may be linked to higher risk of Alzheimer's disease
